FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of hops that an LSP can traverse, including the ingress and egress routers. An LSP is not set up if the hop limit is exceeded. This value can be changed dynamically for an LSP that is already set up with the following implications.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of hops the LSP can traverse, expressed as an integer. Values-2 to 255.
